item.title: Screeching Like A Gull Is The Goal Of This Bird-Brained Contest
item.description: The European Gull Screeching Championship attracted 60 seagull soundalikes from 14 countries to the coastal town of De Panne, Belgium, this past weekend.

item.title: Ronan The Head-Bopping Sea Lion Proves Animals Can Keep A Beat
item.description: Ronan the sea lion can groove to rock and electronica, but the 15-year-old's talent shines most in bobbing to disco hits like "Boogie Wonderland."
